html: Congress must stand on the side of the people and #ProtectOurCare. Today, we’ll vote on my resolution calling on the Trump Administration to stop backing a lawsuit that threatens Americans’ health care and protections for those with pre-existing conditions.
text:
Congress must stand on the side of the people and #ProtectOurCare.

Today, we’ll vote on my resolution calling on the Trump Administration to stop backing a lawsuit that threatens Americans’ health care and protections for those with pre-existing conditions.

html: Preventing veteran suicide and supporting mental health services is a top priority and my provision will help make sure challenges surrounding access to child care services does not hinder a veteran’s ability to make crucial appointments.
text: Preventing veteran suicide and supporting mental health services is a top priority and my provision will help make sure challenges surrounding access to child care services does not hinder a veteran’s ability to make crucial appointments.

html: Veterans should never struggle to treat their PTSD, depression or any other psychological wounds because they can’t find a safe place for their child. This bill will give veterans the security of having access to free, quality child care while they receive mental health treatmentpic.twitter.com/kWxUPpNZ1n
text: Veterans should never struggle to treat their PTSD, depression or any other psychological wounds because they can’t find a safe place for their child. html: We owe it to all Americans to keep the government running. Using a government shutdown as a negotiating tool is simply unacceptable. As February 15th approaches, I urge President Trump and Congressional leadership to focus on keeping the government open.
text: We owe it to all Americans to keep the government running. Using a government shutdown as a negotiating tool is simply unacceptable. As February 15th approaches, I urge President Trump and Congressional leadership to focus on keeping the government open.

html: I worked as a print reporter for 17 years before serving in Congress, so I've seen the news business from both sides. Here's what I know about the #FreePress: 1: In an era when @realDonaldTrump routinely attacks the press as #FakeNews, it's never been harder to be a reporter.
text:
I worked as a print reporter for 17 years before serving in Congress, so I've seen the news business from both sides. Here's what I know about the #FreePress:

1: In an era when @realDonaldTrump routinely attacks the press as #FakeNews, it's never been harder to be a reporter.
